AuthHTMLHeader ( $  reloadrate = 0  ) 

Common HTML Header lines.

Attention:
This function should be called by all pages, because it enforces authentication.
Parameters:
[in] $reloadrate Page reload rate, defaults to 0 (no reload)

CheckPageActivation ( $  active  ) 

Checks and prints a warning if the page is not active.

$active is set during left and top menu creation according to logged in user.

Parameters:
[in] $active boolean Whether the page was active

PrintHelpBox ( $  msg = '',
$  width = 300 
)

Prints the message in a simple box, without an image.

Used in simple info boxes on the right of components. New lines are replaced with html breaks before displaying.

Parameters:
[in] $msg Message string
[in] $width Box width, defaults to 300px
Warning:
Checks if $msg is empty, because some automatized functions may not pass a non-empth string (such as on configuration pages), thus the box should not be displayed. Just take debug logs.

PrintHelpWindow ( $  msg,
$  width = 'auto',
$  type = 'INFO' 
)

Prints the message in a box with a title bar and an image.

Used as the main explanation box on a page. New lines are replaced with html breaks before displaying.

Parameters:
[in] $msg Message string
[in] $width Box width, defaults to auto
[in] $type Image type to display
Warning:
$Width type should be string, because some functions use 'auto'.
